vulnerabilities.title: Insecure Session Cookie Configuration
vulnerabilities.evidence: Cookie issues: Missing HttpOnly flag, Missing SameSite attribute
vulnerabilities.remediation: Set Secure, HttpOnly, and SameSite attributes on session cookies

vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement proper authorization checks for object access
